text: kraistara bali enu (yava satyavu) illavendu yahudigalu heluttare mattu yahudigala bali enu illavendu kraistaru heluttare. Hagendu, avaru (ibbaru) granthavannu oduvavaragiddare. Tiluvalike illadavaru ide riti, avaru aduttiruvantaha matanne aduttare. Avaru bhinnategolagagidda visayagalalli punarut'thana dina, allahane avara naduve tirpu niduvanu
